directions: Bring large pot of water to boil. Add carrots and cook 1 minute. Add asparagus, fennel and peas; cook until all are crisp tender, about 2 minutes longer. Drain vegetables. Return to pot. Add oil and tarragon and toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1 pound asparagus, trimmed, cut into 4-inch lengths
title: Spring Vegetable Medley
